header.title: Carlos Wo Ching
header.pharagraph: With more than 10 years of experience tattooing and working in international conventions and collaborations in studios around the world, offering a professional and unique artistic expression.

service1.title: Personalized Design
service1.pharagraph: The true customization is in listening to the client and adapting to the style that you want.

service2.title: Innovative Ideas
service2.pharagraph: Innovation has become an indispensable skill in tattoo artists, to create unique and quality designs.

service3.title: Tattoos Re-design
service3.pharagraph: Let's try to find you a solution or an answer to the question of what to do if I am dissatisfied with my tattoo.

service4.title: The Best Standards
service4.pharagraph: We always work under all existing rules and regulations for our profession.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subTitle: Leave us your contact to quote a job with Carlos Wo Ching
